title: Why Are Restaurants Understaffed? - Beyond the Scenes featuring Padma Lakshmi
itunes:title: Why Are Restaurants Understaffed? - Beyond the Scenes featuring Padma Lakshmi
description:
Roy Wood Jr. sits down with Padma Lakshmi and The Daily Show staffers Madeleine Kuhns and Stephanie O. to discuss why restaurant workers aren't running back to the industry.
